question: My mother's sister husband is mahram or non mahram for my sister.Is she needed to hijab from him.
answer:
QUESTION

My mother's sister husband is  mahram or non mahram for my sister.Is she needed to hijab from him.

ANSWER


Share:

 

 

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful
Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

 

Your mother’s sister’s husband is ghair mahram to your sister. Therefore hijaab is necessary between them.

وَأُحِلَّ لَكُمْ مَا وَرَاءَ ذَلِكُمْ (سورة النساء ) قال ابن كثير رحمه الله تحت هذه الاية: اي ما عدا من ذكرن من المحارم هن لكم حلال. (تفسير ابن كثير )

(Fataawa Mahmoodiya V11 Pg 300 Faruqiyya)

 
And Allah knows best
Wassalam

Ml. Ebrahim Desai,
Student Darul Iftaa
